label: providerParty
comment: The provider party for this monitoring IOT device.
The referenced party providing this document authentication.
The trade party providing this document authentication.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: A proof that something is genuine.

An object or system made or adapted for an IOT (Internet of Things) purpose such as to collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data especially when connected to a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
